name: Seafile-2.1.12
body:
* Support generating share links with passwords
* Improve the files sorting when exporting from / sharing to Seafile
* Fixed a bug that may cause infinite loop when server uses invalid SSL certificates
* Fixed a bug when relogin using shibboleth
* Other bug fixes

name: Seafile-2.1.11
body:
* Only retry the failed uploads up to 3 times.
* Make detection of invalidated token work again

name: Seafile-2.1.10
body:
- Added support to backup the phone contacts to a library
- Fixed a bug in client-side decryption for android 4.4 and older

name: Seafile-2.1.9
body:
- Fixed a crashing bug when it fails to create the camera upload folder
- Fixed a ui bug in the preference view
- Disabled the back button when unlocking with gestures
- Fixed action bar back button when there is no current account defined
- Fixed accounts activity back button when no accounts exists
- Show a toast when a file upload is started

name: Seafile-2.1.7
body:
1. Hide certain menu items (rename/move/etc.) for read only files/folders
2. Fixed a bug that leads to app crash when downloading a file (#592)
3. Fixed a bug that leads to the "go back" button not being shown

name: Seafile-2.1.6
body:
## Changes
1. Support tap to refresh when loading starred files failed
2. Fixed bizarre percentage when downloading large files
3. Fixed return home screen failed bug when back button pressed
4. Fixed screen total blank bug when external share cancelled 
5. Fixed several UI issues for a better ux

name: Seafile-2.1.5
body:
## Changes
1. Fixed several bugs that may lead app crash

name: Seafile-2.1.4
body:
## Changes
1. Support create, edit and delete libraries
2. Fixed manual refresh not working bug
3. Fixed downloading progress inaccurate bug 
4. Fixed several bugs when open files (folders) in activity list

name: Seafile-2.1.3
body:
## Changes
1. Support two-factor authentication (depends on server 6.0+)
2. Improved ux of login page

name: Seafile-2.1.2
body:
1. Restore scroll position when browsing between folder and subfolders
2. Fixed starred file under encrypted repo still accessible bug
3. Fixed crash when sharing file from other app
4. Fixed some activity item clicking event not responded bug

name: Seafile-2.1.1
body:
## Changes
1. Support auto update files under encrypted repo
2. Support automatically clear password when sign out account
3. Support clear password manually
4. Use material based dialog theme
5. Hide client side encryption option if server not supported 
6. Display soft keyboard if text input is required in dialog
7. Fixed last file chunk might be filled with empty content bug 
8. Fixed crash when downloading empty files under encrypted repo

name: Seafile-2.1.0
body:
## Changes
1. Support client side encryption for encrypted libraries 
2. Show loading progressbar when opening activities tab
3. Using GB/MB/KB instead of GiB/MiB/KiB to show Quota and file size
4. Fixed open markdown file failed bug
5. Ungrade version of build-in markdown viewer
6. Fixed several bugs that may lead app crash

name: Seafile-2.0.6
body:
## Changes
1. Support custom cache path
2. Fixed some grammar errors
3. Improved UI for camera upload configuration helper
4. Improved UI of login page
5. Fixed network request params encoding bug #463  
6. Fixed several bugs that may lead App crash

name: Seafile-2.0.5
body:
## Changes
1. Support build-in Activities

name: Seafile-2.0.4
body:
## Changes
1. Notify user if the file for uploading already exist on server

name: Seafile-2.0.3
body:
## Changes
1. Fixed Shibboleth account creation not working bug

name: Seafile-2.0.2
body:
## Changes
1. Fixed several bugs that may lead App crash

name: Seafile-2.0.1
body:
## Changes
1. Ask user for storage access permission on Android 6
2. Fixed several bugs that may lead App crash

name: Seafile-2.0.0
body:
## Changes
1. New material design UI and update icons
2. Refactor camera uploads functions
3. Seafile is now translated to Brazilian Portuguese
4. Support login by username or email address
5. Support upload camera photos to separate folders, optimize performance and stability 
6. Fixed an security issue that user can open the encrpted library from Activities tab

name: Seafile-1.9.3
body:
## Changes
1. Support unstar a file 
2. Auto hide the soft keyboard after clicked login button 
3. Optimized multiple files operation
4. Fixed incorrect behavior of back button when sliding among tabs 
5. Fixed several bugs that may lead App crash

name: Seafile-1.9.2
body:
## Changes
1. View files more intelligently
2. Beautify layout inside of encrypted libraries
3. Beautify text select anchor in text editor
4. Optimize UX when editing multiple files
5. Fixed several bugs that may lead App crash

name: Seafile-1.9.1
body:
## Changes
1. Fixed action bar title not updated after files deleted in action mode 
2. Fixed a crash when uploading files shared from other Apps
3. Fixed layout messed up when copying multiple files
4. Fixed previous browsing progress lost bug

name: Seafile-1.9.0
body:
## Changes
1. Apply a new theme and update new icons
2. Redesign UI interaction of single file/folder operations
3. Redesign tabs of sliding pages in the main interface
4. Redesign gallery for a better performance
5. Support edit multiple files, including delete, copy, move and download
6. Support view pictures in built-in gallery when browsing files in Starred Tab or searched results
7. Support "Shared" group in library list
8. Support sort Chinese file names
9. Optimize thumbnail loading effects
10. Optimized download a file menu
11. Use a readable name when uploading unknown file types
12. Clarify some textual information
13. Beautify file list layout
14. Fixed Markdown file type recognition error

name: Seafile-1.8.1
body:
## Changes
1. beautify some textual information
2. enable download folder menu in read only library
3. decrease gallery loading time and sort photos automatically based on global settings
4. optimize ui of sort files
5. fixed .dmg file type recognition error
6. fixed several bugs that may lead to app crash

name: Seafile-1.8.0
body:
## Changes
1. support multi selection to manage downloads & uploads
2. support overwrite files being shared from other Apps
3. support sort files by name or by last modified time both in ascending and descending order
4. fixed gallery browsing progress lost error after device rotated
5. fixed searched result disappeared after device rotated
6. fixed cannot open photos error in encrypted library
7. fixed an error of ssl certificate validation
8. fix account list became empty error when upgraded to 1.7.0+

name: Seafile-1.7.1
body:
## Changes
- update German translations
- fixed incorrect state info of downloading list

name: Seafile-1.7.0
body:
1. support browsing photos in gallery
2. support exiting the app when authorization expired
3. optimized hide and show effects of Search bar and Activity Tab
4. optimized UI of camera upload service
5. fixed white space error of server url and email address
6. fixed a login failed error

name: Seafile-1.6.3
body:
## Changes
1. support popup notifications when upload or download files
2. fix an error when download folders and subfolders

name: Seafile-1.6.2
body:
## Changes
1. support download a folder recursively
2. update to use tokenv2 of Shibboleth SSO

name: Seafile-1.6.1
body:
## Changes
1. fixed hostname validation security issue
2. fixed a crash when file uploaded
3. fixed a compatible crash

name: Seafile-1.6.0
body:
## Changes
1. support landscape view
2. support server side thumbnail
3. change descriptional texts of subtitle to be last modified time
4. hide Activities tab and search function on community server edition
5. support cache starred files
6. support auto upload videos
7. support auto upload from custom folders
8. support Czech translations
9. optimize document provider (SAF)
   - Support writing (uploading) files
   - Support creating files/directories
   - Show starred files
   - Improve repository list: use Seafile icons for repositories, show descriptions
   - fix: don't allow user to enter encrypted repos
   - improve account (root) list: display account email address in 2nd line
   - use a thread pool for concurrent tasks
   - remove verbose FileNotFoundExceptions
   - some refactoring
   - some small fixes

name: Seafile-1.5.1
body:
## Changes
1. show navigation button (home up button) correctly when sliding tabs
2. optimize application not response when uploading large amount of photos
3. fix download folder feature does not work bug
4. fix export file not working bug
5. fix transfer task list empty when unlock screen
6. fix several crashes

name: Seafile-1.5.0
body:
## Changes
- support search libraries
- support download a directory
- support star a file
- support Japanese language
- optimize operations when opening a file
- optimize transfer list
- fix language resouce grammatical error

name: Seafile-1.4.2
body:
## Changes
1. Support Shibboleth SSO
2. Optimize layouts for tablets
3. Quit the app when the current account is deleted
4. Fix a bug of that crashes the app when opening settings menu when network down
5. Fix camera auto upload when using 3G
6. Improve gesture lock for android 4.1 and above

name: Seafile-1.4.1
body:
## Changes
1. Enhanced SSL security by using TLSv1.1+ and disable SSLv3
2. Fixed password and email field switched on device rotating
3. Fixed several bugs that may lead to app crashing
4. Fixed a bug of gesture lock

name: Seafile-1.4.0
body:
## Changes
1. Support sign out current account
2. Support clear cached files
3. Support android Storage Access Framework
4. Improved files list refresh
5. Fixed bugs of opening files from Activities tab

name: Seafile-1.3.0
body:
## Changes
1. Display accounts avatars
2. Refresh list when pulling down
3. Improved Gesture Lock UI styles
4. Show self signed certificate details
5. Fixed "not remembered unsafe connections” bug
6. Fixed Settings preference compatibility
7. Fixed camera upload “only upload when wifi is turned on” bug

name: Seafile-1.2.0
body:
## Changes
1. Redesigned UI
2. Fixed gesture lock settings
3. Fixed camera auto upload "Only upload in Wifi" settings
4. support uploading multiple files in "Share to Seafile"

name: Seafile-1.1.1
body:

2. Updated Korean translation

name: Seafile-1.1.0

New feature: camera photo auto upload

2. Added pin lock

name: Seafile-1.0.0
body:

1. Support file delete/copy/move operations
2. Support take a photo and upload under a folder
